query.text:
&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Declare; &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Select;
if dbo.AI_ERP$Function$CheckSQLInjection(@stt_rec) = 0 return &GLTranReportSql; else begin declare @m_ma_nt0 varchar(10), @key varchar(128), @bilingual tinyint, @printCharge bit declare @h_line1 as nvarchar(128), @h_line2 as nvarchar(128), @h_line3 as nvarchar(128), @h_line4 as nvarchar(128) select @m_ma_nt0 = val from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @h_line1 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC009' select @h_line2 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC010' select @h_line3 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC011' select @h_line4 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC012' if @@form in ('050', '060', '051', '061', '070', '080', '150', '160', '170', '180') select @printCharge = 0 else select @printCharge = 1
if @@form in ('064', '065') begin declare @ngay_ct0 smalldatetime, @dvcs0 varchar(33) select @ngay_ct0 = ngay_ct, @dvcs0 = ma_dvcs from @@prime$partition$current where stt_rec = @stt_rec select @h_line1 as h_line1, @h_line2 as h_line2, @h_line3 as h_line3, @h_line4 as h_line4 exec rs_rptPrintCBTranExport_v1 @ngay_ct0, @ngay_ct0, '46', @dvcs0, @stt_rec, '1', '1', @@language, @@userID, @@admin, @printCharge select 'rptPrintCBTRan_01_A5' as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end
if @@form in ('090', '095') begin declare @ngay_ct1 smalldatetime, @dvcs1 varchar(33) select @ngay_ct1 = ngay_ct, @dvcs1 = ma_dvcs from @@prime$partition$current where stt_rec = @stt_rec select @h_line1 as h_line1, @h_line2 as h_line2, @h_line3 as h_line3, @h_line4 as h_line4 exec rs_rptPrintCRTranExport_v1 @ngay_ct1, @ngay_ct1, '46', @dvcs1, @stt_rec, '1', '1', @@language, @@userID, @@admin, 1, @printCharge select 'rptPrintCRTran_02_v1' as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end
-- Version 1 if exists (select 1 from kbsdmauin where controller = 'CBTran' and version = 'v1' and status = '1') begin select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' if @@form in ('031', '041', '230', '240') begin select rtrim(a.ong_ba) as ong_ba, rtrim(b.ten_kh) as ten_kh, rtrim(b.ten_kh2) as ten_kh2, a.dia_chi, a.dien_giai, a.t_tien, a.t_tien_nt, a.ma_nt, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tien, 'V') as t_tien_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tien_nt, 'V') as t_tien_nt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tien, 'E') as t_tien_in_word2, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tien_nt, 'E') as t_tien_nt_in_word2, a.so_ct_goc, a.dien_giai_ct_goc, a.ma_nk, ltrim(a.so_ct) as so_ct, a.ty_gia, a.tk, replace(str(day(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') as ngay, replace(str(month(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') as thang, cast(year(ngay_ct) as char(4)) as nam, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$FormatStringValue(a.ty_gia) as chuoi_ty_gia from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where stt_rec = @stt_rec exec rs_PrintCRTran2 @@language, @key, 'd46$$partition$current', @@id, 1 &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Result; return end
if @@form in ('030', '040', '130', '140') begin select rtrim(a.ong_ba) as ong_ba, rtrim(b.ten_kh) as ten_kh, rtrim(b.ten_kh2) as ten_kh2, a.dia_chi, a.dien_giai, a.t_tien, a.t_tien_nt, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt, a.ma_nt, a.ma_nk, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tien, @@language) as t_tien_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tien_nt, @@language) as t_tien_nt_in_word, a.so_ct_goc, a.dien_giai_ct_goc, a.ma_nk, ltrim(a.so_ct) as so_ct, a.tk, a.ty_gia, replace(str(day(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, cast(year(ngay_ct) as char(4)) nam, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$FormatStringValue(a.ty_gia) as chuoi_ty_gia from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where stt_rec = @stt_rec exec rs_PrintCRTran2 @@language, @key, 'd46$$partition$current', @@id, 1 &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Result; return end
select @h_line1 as h_line1, @h_line2 as h_line2, @h_line3 as h_line3, @h_line4 as h_line4 declare @ngay_ct smalldatetime, @dvcs varchar(33) select @ngay_ct = ngay_ct, @dvcs = ma_dvcs from @@prime$partition$current where stt_rec = @stt_rec
if @@form in ('070', '080') begin exec rs_rptPrintCRTranExport_v1 @ngay_ct, @ngay_ct, '46', @dvcs, @stt_rec, '2', '1', @@language, @@userID, @@admin, 1, @printCharge select 'rptPrintCRTran_01_v1' as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end
if @@form in ('051', '061', '170', '180') begin exec rs_rptPrintCRTranExport_v1 @ngay_ct, @ngay_ct, '46', @dvcs, @stt_rec, '1', '2', @@language, @@userID, @@admin, 1, @printCharge if @@form in ('051', '061') select 'rptPrintCRTran_01BI_v1' as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; else select case when @@form = '170' then 'CRTran_01BIv1' else 'CRTranFC_01BIv1' end as templateFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end
if @@form in ('050', '060', '150', '160') begin exec rs_rptPrintCRTranExport_v1 @ngay_ct, @ngay_ct, '46', @dvcs, @stt_rec, '1', '1', @@language, @@userID, @@admin, 1, @printCharge if @@form in ('050', '060') select 'rptPrintCRTran_01_v1' as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; else select case @@form when '150' then '&Circular.TemplateFile.CRTran;' else '&Circular.TemplateFileFC.CRTran;' end as templateFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end
if @@form in ('011', '021', '210', '220') begin exec rs_rptPrintCBTranExport_v1 @ngay_ct, @ngay_ct, '46', @dvcs, @stt_rec, '1', '2', @@language, @@userID, @@admin, @printCharge if @@form in ('011', '021') select 'rptPrintCBTran_01BI_v1' as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; else select 'CBTranBI_v1' as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end
exec rs_rptPrintCBTranExport_v1 @ngay_ct, @ngay_ct, '46', @dvcs, @stt_rec, '1', '1', @@language, @@userID, @@admin, @printCharge if @@form in ('010', '020') select 'rptPrintCBTran_01_v1' as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; else select case @@form when '110' then 'CBTran_v1' else 'CBTranFC_v1' end as templateFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end
-- Previous version select @printCharge = 0 if @@form in ('011', '021', '031', '041', '051', '210', '220', '230', '240', '061', '170', '180') begin select @bilingual = 1 if @@form in ('031', '041', '230', '240', '051', '061', '170', '180') begin select rtrim(a.ong_ba) as ong_ba,rtrim(b.ten_kh) as ten_kh ,rtrim(b.ten_kh2) as ten_kh2, a.dia_chi, a.dien_giai, a.t_tien, a.t_tien_nt, a.ma_nt, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tien, 'V') as t_tien_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tien_nt, 'V') as t_tien_nt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tien, 'E') as t_tien_in_word2, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tien_nt, 'E') as t_tien_nt_in_word2, a.so_ct_goc, a.dien_giai_ct_goc, a.ma_nk, ltrim(a.so_ct) as so_ct, a.ty_gia, a.tk, replace(str(day(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, cast(year(ngay_ct) as char(4)) nam, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$FormatStringValue(a.ty_gia) as chuoi_ty_gia from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where stt_rec = @stt_rec end else begin select case when a.ong_ba <> '' then rtrim(a.ong_ba) else rtrim(b.ten_kh) end as ten_kh, case when a.ong_ba <> '' then rtrim(a.ong_ba) else rtrim(b.ten_kh2) end as ten_kh2, a.dia_chi, a.dien_giai, a.t_tien, a.t_tien_nt, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt, a.ma_nt, a.ma_nk, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tien, 'V') as t_tien_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tien_nt, 'V') as t_tien_nt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tien, 'E') as t_tien_in_word2, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tien_nt, 'E') as t_tien_nt_in_word2, a.so_ct_goc, a.dien_giai_ct_goc, a.ma_nk, ltrim(a.so_ct) as so_ct, a.tk, a.ty_gia, replace(str(day(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, cast(year(ngay_ct) as char(4)) nam, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$FormatStringValue(a.ty_gia) as chuoi_ty_gia from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where stt_rec = @stt_rec end end else begin if @@form in ('050', '060', '070', '080', '150', '160', '030', '040', '130', '140') begin select rtrim(a.ong_ba) as ong_ba,rtrim(b.ten_kh) as ten_kh ,rtrim(b.ten_kh2) as ten_kh2, a.dia_chi, a.dien_giai, a.t_tien, a.t_tien_nt, a.ma_nt, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tien, @@language) as t_tien_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tien_nt, @@language) as t_tien_nt_in_word, a.so_ct_goc, a.dien_giai_ct_goc, a.ma_nk, ltrim(a.so_ct) as so_ct, a.ty_gia, a.tk, replace(str(day(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, cast(year(ngay_ct) as char(4)) nam, @h_line1 as h_line1, @h_line2 as h_line2, @h_line3 as h_line3, @h_line4 as h_line4, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$FormatStringValue(a.ty_gia) as chuoi_ty_gia from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where stt_rec = @stt_rec end else begin select case when a.ong_ba <> '' then rtrim(a.ong_ba) else rtrim(b.ten_kh) end as ten_kh, case when a.ong_ba <> '' then rtrim(a.ong_ba) else rtrim(b.ten_kh2) end as ten_kh2, a.dia_chi, a.dien_giai, a.t_tien, a.t_tien_nt, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt, a.ma_nt, a.ma_nk, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tien, @@language) as t_tien_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tien_nt, @@language) as t_tien_nt_in_word, a.so_ct_goc, a.dien_giai_ct_goc, a.ma_nk, ltrim(a.so_ct) as so_ct, a.tk, a.ty_gia, replace(str(day(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, cast(year(ngay_ct) as char(4)) nam, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$FormatStringValue(a.ty_gia) as chuoi_ty_gia from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where stt_rec = @stt_rec end end select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' if @@form in ('030', '040', '130', '140', '031', '041', '230', '240') begin exec rs_PrintCRTran2 @@language, @key, 'd46$$partition$current', @@id, @bilingual end else begin declare @strSQL nvarchar(4000) set @strSQL = 'select a.tk_co, sum(a.tien) as tien, sum(a.tien_nt) as tien_nt' set @strSQL = @strSQL + ' from (select 0 as l1, line_nbr, tk_co, tien, tien_nt from ' + dbo.ff30_DTable('d46$$partition$current') + ' a with(nolock) where stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + ''''
if @printCharge = 1 begin set @strSQL = @strSQL + char(13) + 'union all' set @strSQL = @strSQL + char(13) + 'select 1, line_nbr, tk_thue_no, t_thue, t_thue_nt from r30$$partition$current a with(nolock) where stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' set @strSQL = @strSQL + char(13) + 'union all' set @strSQL = @strSQL + char(13) + 'select 2, a.line_nbr, b.tk_cp, a.tien_cp, a.tien_cp_nt from f46$$partition$current a with(nolock) join dmcpnh b on a.ma_cp = b.ma_cp where a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' end
set @strSQL = @strSQL + ' ) a' set @strSQL = @strSQL + ' group by a.tk_co order by min(a.l1), min(a.line_nbr)' exec sp_executesql @strSQL end end
&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Result;

header.v: Giấy báo có dạng tệp xlsx (Excel)
